title: recipes_Grilled_Zucchini_and_Squash
text:
Title: Grilled Zucchini and Squash.
.
Description: Zucchini and yellow squash are cut into uniform pieces, and sealed into a foil packet with butter, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Then the packets are grilled until the vegetables are juicy and flavorful..
.
Ingredients:.
- 2 zucchini, halved lengthwise and cut in 1/4 inch slices.
- 1 summer squash, thinly sliced.
- 0.75 cup butter.
- 1 tablespoon salt.
- 2 tablespoons ground black pepper.
- 2 tablespoons garlic powder.
.
Instructions:.
- Preheat grill for medium-high heat..
- Place the zucchini, and squash on a large sheet of aluminum foil, and dot with butter. Season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Seal vegetables in the foil..
- Place the foil pack on the preheated grill, and cook 20 minutes, until vegetables are tender..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 234 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 7 g.
cholesterolContent: 61 mg.
fiberContent: 2 g.
proteinContent: 2 g.
saturatedFatContent: 15 g.
sodiumContent: 1335 mg.
sugarContent: 3 g.
fatContent: 23 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 6 servings.
